hanzi-su-wiki:
規

Значения

Правило, норма

Мнемоника

Вслед за ошибкой одного из императоров вместо стрелы 矢 стали писать муж 夫. Циркуль, ножек которого вошла в поверхность, как стрела, а другая, словно взглядом 見, обводит круг. В расширенном понимании — стандарт, критерий, норма, мера — циркуль вычерчивает только окружности правильной формы.

Варианты

规

guī
compass; a rule; regulation; to admonish; to plan; to scheme
компас; правило; регулирование; увещевать; планировать; составить схему
rtega_mnemonic:
規規RS
规规		rules, regulations, customs, law, standard
  • person 夫 seeing 見 to it that the rules are being implemented so everything happens according to law and standards
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 规)
Pictophonetic: 夫 indicates the sound; 見 (observe) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:

規模 [ guī mó ]: scale; scope; extent; Classifiers: 个

heisig_chinese_memo: A husband sets the regulations (rules) of the household based on how he sees fit.
heisig_constituent: standard, husband, see, telescope, eye, human legs
koohiiStory1: In the male-dominated world of yesterday, the husband´s way of seeing things was considered the standard point of view. Women who dared to disagree were frowned upon.
koohiiStory2: Unfortunately, Homer Simpson is the standard model of a husband in American society. (Placement: You have to look in the RIGHT places to find one that doesn´t fit that mold.).
jp_example_words:
規格(きかく): standard, norm
規制(きせい): regulation
規定(きてい): regulation, provisions
規範(きはん): model, standard, pattern, norm, criterion, example
規模(きぼ): scale, scope, plan, structure
規約(きやく): agreement, rules, code
正規(せいき): regular, legal, formal, established, legitimate
規準(きじゅん): standard, basis, criteria, norm
規律(きりつ): order, rules, law
定規(じょうぎ): (measuring) ruler
不規則(ふきそく): irregularity, unsteadiness, disorderly
規則(きそく): regulations
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A man who is husband material can see a standard woman and think she’s the greatest thing ever. This man will make a great husband. Even though the lady is pretty standard, the husband treats her like she’s anything but.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: This husband sets a new standard for what it means to be a husband. He’s pretty great. Imagine yourself shaking this husband’s hand because he’s so awesome.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: It’s pretty standard for a husband and wife to exchange vows when getting married, and the husband said this girl held the key (き) to his heart. She unlocked the husband’s heart with the key and now he’s a man made whole.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture this woman actually sticking a physical key into the husband’s chest and turning it. Now this is anything but standard, but it’ll help you remember this kanji and its reading.
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 覗 (のぞく、うかがう、シ заглядывать, подглядывать).
Ru_Words:
規制きせい
  • регулирование, введение в определённые рамки, нормирование

    規模きぼ
  • масштаб, размер, размах
    • 規定きてい
  • правила, предписания, регламент, постановление
  • формулировка, определение
    • warodai
    新規しんき
  • новый, только появившийся
    • 規則きそく
  • правило, правила, распорядок, устав
    • warodai
Ru_Radicals: 二 (два), 人 (человек), 土 (земля), 見 (видеть)
Ru_trainchinese: guī: (графема) циркуль; закон, правило; планировать; советовать
Kanshudo_mnemonic: to see (見) your husband (夫) is standard
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A husband sets the regulations (rules) of the household based on how he sees fit.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " husband ", from " see ". The original meaning is law and criterion. "Said Wen": "Regulations, there are laws. From husband to see." Paragraph note: "Knowing. Husband sees it. Father Wen Bo's mother said: "A woman is more wise than a woman, and a man is more wise than a husband." "Tong" says: "The husband knows how to use it, and he must follow the rules." So the rules follow the husband." Such as "Selected Works. "Qu Yuan "Li Sao"" "Reach the rules and correct mistakes", Lu Yanji's note: "The rules, the rules are also." Tang Dynasty Han Yu "Send Cui Twenty-Six Lizhi": "All men are beautiful, and they can almost abide by the family rules."

Ancient books, often with "rules" and said that " moment " in the original meaning of Norma, said it is a " regulated original meaning" of a compass, draw a circle that is a tool. Such as "Mozi. "Tianzhizhong": "Today, the husband will follow the rules, and will measure the world's 圜 and non 圜." "Mencius. "Gao Zi Shang" "must follow rules", Zhao Qi noted: "Guide, so it is a circle." " Guide " also means the action of drawing a circle, such as "Mandarin. Zhou Yuxia" "His mother's dream ruled her hips with ink", Wei Zhao's note: "Regulations, painting also." It also means round shape, such as "Chu Ci. "The Big Move" "Zeng cheeks leaning on the ears, the eyebrows are only regulated", Wang Yi's note: "Regulations, 圜也."

" Guide " means exhortation and advice. Such as "Shang Shu. "Yin Zheng": "Officials and teachers should be governed by rules, and craftsmanship and art should be admonished." Cai Chen's collection: "Regulations, righteousness." "Zuo Zhuan. In the Fourteenth Year of Xianggong, "Working to recite admonitions, doctors' rules," Du pre-notes: "Regulations, right admonitions to the monarch." Kong Yingdashu: "Regulations, admonitions."

" Regulation " also has the meaning of seeking and planning. "Mandarin. "Zhou Yuzhong": "Regulations for thousands of miles are considered to be a delicacy." Wei Zhao's note: "Regulations are based on planning." "Family Instructions of Yan Family": "In the veil and above the temple, you cannot draw rules for the master It is also a shame for a gentleman to seek a community."

" Guide " is commonly used as " peep " and " peep ", meaning peeping, peeping. "tube. "Princes and Ministers" "The ministers pretend to be women's ability, and govern their affection", Ding Shihan said: "Regulations, ancient words." "Han Feizi. "System points" "But what is the way to go to the slightest? The order of the rules is also the one who regulates their feelings." Gu Guangqi: "Regulations, read as a glimpse." There are also examples in unearthed documents, "Mawangdui. I Komoto "Line 20:" irregularities (glimpse) in lattice window to know Heaven. "Jane Han North" I "27 Jane:" No Regulation (glimpse) in lattice window to wisdom Heaven. "Begin" regulation " For " peep ". The forty-seventh chapter of Wang Bi's "Laozi" was handed down: "If you don't peek at the sword, you can see the way of heaven." He Shang Gong's "Lao Zi" is written as "You don't see the way of heaven, [with] see the way of heaven."
humanum_short_description_en: From " husband ", from " see ". The original meaning is law and criterion. One said that the original meaning is a tool for drawing circles.
humanum_full_description:
從「夫」，從「見」。本義為法度、準則。《說文》：「規，有法度也。从夫从見。」段注：「會意。丈夫所見也。公父文伯之母曰：『女智莫如婦，男智莫如夫。』《字統》曰：『丈夫識用，必合規矩。』故規从夫。」如《文選．屈原〈離騷〉》「偭規矩而改錯」，呂延濟注：「規矩，法則也。」唐代韓愈〈寄崔二十六立之〉：「諸男皆秀朗，幾能守家規。」

　　古書中常以「規矩」並稱，「矩」的本義是矩尺，故一說「規」的本義是圓規，即畫圓的工具。如《墨子．天志中》：「今夫輪人操其規，將以量度天下之圜與不圜也。」《孟子．告子上》「必以規矩」，趙岐注：「規，所以為圓也。」「規」也表示畫圓的動作，如《國語．周語下》「其母夢神規其臀以墨」，韋昭注：「規，畫也。」又表示圓形，如《楚辭．大招》「曾頰倚耳，曲眉規只」， 王逸注：「規，圜也。」

　　「規」表示規勸、勸諫。如《尚書．胤征》：「官師相規，工執藝事以諫。」蔡沈集傳：「規，正也。」《左傳．襄公十四年》「工誦箴諫，大夫規誨」，杜預注：「規，正諫誨其君。」孔穎達疏：「規，諫也。」

　　「規」又有謀求、謀劃的意思。《國語．周語中》：「規方千里以為甸服」，韋昭注：「規，規畫而有之也。」《顏氏家訓》：「入帷幄之中，參廟堂之上，不能為主畫規以謀社稷，君子所恥也。」

　　「規」通作「窺」、「闚」，表示窺視、窺察。《管子．君臣上》「大臣假於女之能，以規主情」，丁士涵云：「規，古窺字。」《韓非子．制分》「然則去微姦之道奈何？其務令之相規其情者也。」顧廣圻：「規，讀為闚。」出土文獻也有例子，《馬王堆．老子甲本》第20行：「不規（窺）於牖，以知天道。」北大漢簡《老子》簡27：「不規（窺）於牖，以智天道。」皆以「規」為「窺」。傳世王弼本《老子》四十七章：「不闚牖，見天道。」河上公本《老子》作「不窺牖，［以］見天道」。
humanum_short_description: 從「夫」，從「見」。本義為法度、準則。一說本義是畫圓的工具。

規模 [ guī mó ]: scale; scope; extent; Classifiers: 个

規範 [ guī fàn ]: norm; standard; specification; regulation; rule; within the rules; to fix rules; to regulate; to specify

①畫圓等的儀器：圓規。兩腳規。
②法則，章程，標準：規則。法規。常規。清規戒律。
③格局，範圍：規模。
④相勸：規盡力。規諫。規正(ａ．規勸，匡正；b．整齊；c．規矩)。規勉。
⑤謀劃：規劃。規約。

規範 [ guī fàn ]: norm; standard; specification; regulation; rule; within the rules; to fix rules; to regulate; to specify

從「 夫 」，從「 見 」。本義為法度、準則。《說文》：「規，有法度也。从夫从見。」段注：「會意。丈夫所見也。公父文伯之母曰：『女智莫如婦，男智莫如夫。』《字統》曰：『丈夫識用，必合規矩。』故規从夫。」如《文選．屈原〈離騷〉》「偭規矩而改錯」，呂延濟注：「規矩，法則也。」唐代韓愈〈寄崔二十六立之〉：「諸男皆秀朗，幾能守家規。」 古書中常以「規矩」並稱，「 矩 」的本義是矩尺，故一說「 規 」的本義是圓規，即畫圓的工具。如《墨子．天志中》：「今夫輪人操其規，將以量度天下之圜與不圜也。」《孟子．告子上》「必以規矩」，趙岐注：「規，所以為圓也。」「 規 」也表示畫圓的動作，如《國語．周語下》「其母夢神規其臀以墨」，韋昭注：「規，畫也。」又表示圓形，如《楚辭．大招》「曾頰倚耳，曲眉規只」， 王逸注：「規，圜也。」 「 規 」表示規勸、勸諫。如《尚書．胤征》：「官師相規，工執藝事以諫。」蔡沈集傳：「規，正也。」《左傳．襄公十四年》「工誦箴諫，大夫規誨」，杜預注：「規，正諫誨其君。」孔穎達疏：「規，諫也。」 「 規 」又有謀求、謀劃的意思。《國語．周語中》：「規方千里以為甸服」，韋昭注：「規，規畫而有之也。」《顏氏家訓》：「入帷幄之中，參廟堂之上，不能為主畫規以謀社稷，君子所恥也。」 「 規 」通作「 窺 」、「 闚 」，表示窺視、窺察。《管子．君臣上》「大臣假於女之能，以規主情」，丁士涵云：「規，古窺字。」《韓非子．制分》「然則去微姦之道奈何？其務令之相規其情者也。」顧廣圻：「規，讀為闚。」出土文獻也有例子，《馬王堆．老子甲本》第20行：「不規（窺）於牖，以知天道。」北大漢簡《老子》簡27：「不規（窺）於牖，以智天道。」皆以「 規 」為「 窺 」。傳世王弼本《老子》四十七章：「不闚牖，見天道。」河上公本《老子》作「不窺牖，［以］見天道」。

規字的基本解释

規
guī
见“规”。

規字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guī］
［《廣韻》居隋切，平支，見。］
亦作“槼1”。“规1”的繁体字。亦作“1”。亦作“1”。
(1)圆规，画圆形的工具。
(2)画圆。
(3)圆形。
(4)借指日月之形。
(5)法度；准则。
(6)典范；风仪。
(7)规劝；谏诤。
(8)规划并占有。
(9)谋求；谋划。
(10)效法，摹拟。
(11)古代田制之一。
(12)文体名。
(13)通“窺”、“闚”。窥察。
[②]［guì］
［《集韻》規恚切，去寘，見。］
“规2”的繁体字。
见“規2規”。

規字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【見字部】　規； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1133第11
【唐韻】居追切【集韻】【韻會】均窺切【正韻】居爲切，?音?。【說文】有法度也。【玉篇】正圜之器也。【禮·經解】規矩誠設，不可欺以方圜。【前漢·律歷志】衡運生規，規圜生矩。【莊子·馬蹄篇】圜者中規，方者中矩。【淮南子·時則訓】規者所以圜萬物也。　又以法正人曰規。【書·?征】官師相規。【傳】規，正也。【詩·衞風·淇奥序】武公能聽其規諫。【疏】正圜以規使依度，猶正君以禮使人德，故謂之規諫。　又規，求計也。【左傳·昭二十六年】規求無度。　又規避違法，以方爲圜也。【正字通】引唐書：規影徭賦。　又謀度也。【禮·儒行】其規爲有如此者。【疏】但自規度所爲之事而行。【戰國策】齊無天下之規。【註】規猶謀也，謂無謀齊者。後漢書凡謀皆作規。　又畫也。【周語】成公之生也，其母夢神規其臀以墨。　又日月圓曰規。【謝靈運·遊南亭詩】密林含餘淸，遠峰影半規。【註】日落峰外，隱其半也。【韓愈·翫月詩】前夕雖十五，月長未滿規。【文苑英華·海日初出賦】赫赫光滿，規規質圓。　又規田。【

regulation
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guī］
["Guangyun" in Suiqie, flat branch, see. ]
Also known as "槼1". Traditional Chinese characters for "許1". Also known as "1". Also known as "1".
(1) Compasses, a tool for drawing circles.
(2) Draw a circle.
(3) Round shape.
(4) By referring to the shape of the sun and the moon.
(5) Laws; guidelines.
(6) Model; wind instrument.
(7) Admonish; Admonish.
(8) Planning and possession.
(9) Seeking; planning.
(10) Imitate and imitate.
(11) One of the ancient land system.
(12) The name of the style.
(13) Through "peep" and "peep". Spy.
[②]［guì］
["Ji Yun" rules are cut, go and set, see you. ]
Traditional Chinese characters for "規2".
See "Regulation 2".

Old glyph
regulation
Name meaning
Nothing.
guī, guì
вм. 规
Radicals: 夫, 見  (husband, see)
Meaning Mnemonic
A man who is husband material can see a standard woman and think she’s the greatest thing ever. This man will make a great husband. Even though the lady is pretty standard, the husband treats her like she’s anything but.
This husband sets a new standard for what it means to be a husband. He’s pretty great. Imagine yourself shaking this husband’s hand because he’s so awesome.
Reading Mnemonic
It’s pretty standard for a husband and wife to exchange vows when getting married, and the husband said this girl held the key (き) to his heart. She unlocked the husband’s heart with the key and now he’s a man made whole.
Picture this woman actually sticking a physical key into the husband’s chest and turning it. Now this is anything but standard, but it’ll help you remember this kanji and its reading.
